metadata.title: CVE-2022-0295 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to 97.0.4692.99 allowed aremote attacker who convinced the user to engage is specific userinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
